c:complexType.name: AreaExtensionPoint
c:complexType.c:documentation:
The class of protovis Area extension points.
See the associated protovis documentation at .

c:property.name: fillStyle
c:property.c:documentation:
The fill color of the area.
See the associated protovis documentation at .

c:property.name: strokeStyle
c:property.c:documentation:
The border stroke color of the area.
See the associated protovis documentation at .

c:property.name: lineWidth
c:property.c:documentation:
The width of the border of the bar.
See the associated protovis documentation at .

c:property.name: width
c:property.c:documentation:
The width of the area (use for horizontal orientation).
See the associated protovis documentation at .

c:property.name: height
c:property.c:documentation:
The height of the area (use for vertical orientation).
See the associated protovis documentation at .

c:property.name: interpolate
c:property.c:documentation:
How to interpolate the area between values.
See the associated protovis documentation at .

c:property.name: tension
c:property.c:documentation:
The tension of cardinal splines,
See the associated protovis documentation at .
